required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Prognostic Value of Serum Biomarkers in Osteosarcoma
clinical_study.official_title: The Prognostic Value of Serum Biomarkers in Osteosarcoma

brief_summary.textblock: Observational retrospective cohort study using laboratory data of blood tests prior to surgical and chemotherapy treatment and other histologic, clinical, and instrumental data related to patient history from digitized medical records and analysis of the same as predictors of outcomes.

primary_outcome.description: Evaluation of 5-year survival in relation to histologic, laboratory, clinical, and instrumental prognostic factors

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of the rate of local recurrence
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of the rate of local recurrence and distant metastasis in relation to histological, laboratory, clinical, and instrumental prognostic factors.

intervention.intervention_name: case series review of clinical data
intervention.description: Extraction of pre-surgical and chemotherapy blood test laboratory data and clinical and instrumental data related to patient history from digitized medical records and analysis

results_reference.citation: Nakamura T, Grimer RJ, Gaston CL, Watanuki M, Sudo A, Jeys L. The prognostic value of the serum level of C-reactive protein for the survival of patients with a primary sarcoma of bone. Bone Joint J. 2013 Mar;95-B(3):411-8. doi: 10.1302/0301-620X.95B3.30344.

Li YJ, Yang X, Zhang WB, Yi C, Wang F, Li P. Clinical implications of six inflammatory biomarkers as prognostic indicators in Ewing sarcoma. Cancer Manag Res. 2017 Sep 28;9:443-451. doi: 10.2147/CMAR.S146827. eCollection 2017.

Aggerholm-Pedersen N, Maretty-Kongstad K, Keller J, Baerentzen S, Safwat A. The Prognostic Value of Serum Biomarkers in Localized Bone Sarcoma. Transl Oncol. 2016 Aug;9(4):322-8. doi: 10.1016/j.tranon.2016.05.006.
